title: 12th Tokyo Motor Show: 1965
brief_description: The annual Tokyo Motor Show displays the progress of the Japanese motor industry to the nation and visitors from overseas. A wide variety of vehicles are manufactured in Japan and this annual event creates great interest from business people and car enthusiasts. Planned by the Japan Motor Industrial Federation.
